thread.title: Geely's Daimler stake: Germany weighs tighter rules

title: Geely's Daimler stake: Germany weighs tighter rules
text:
Geely's Daimler stake: Germany weighs tighter rules 11:59am EST - 01:40 
Germany will investigate whether to tighten the rules that govern when an investor needs to disclose a holding in a company after news that China's Geely purchased a $9 billion stake in Daimler surprised the market. Silvia Antonioli reports.   
Germany will investigate whether to tighten the rules that govern when an investor needs to disclose a holding in a company after news that China's Geely purchased a $9 billion stake in Daimler surprised the market. Silvia Antonioli reports.  //reut.rs/2F8DiCx
